In order for your Students to have access to the resources, they need to be grouped and assigned to the Course.

  1. Use the Teaching Groups panel on the left hand side.
  2. Select the Actions drop down arrow.
  3. Select Add a Teaching Group to this Course to assign the Course to an existing Teaching Group.

You can also create a new Teaching Group and add it to this course from this panel.

Prefer to see it in action? Creating a Teaching Group
